title: [9 YoE, Unemployed, IT Sales Executive, Ireland]
text:
LOGAN CHECHER

Amsterdam, Netherlands  
+31 6 1234 5678  
logan.checher@example.com  
linkedin.com/in/loganchecher  

PROFILE

Results-oriented account executive  
with +9 years of experience in  
leveraging a consultative,customer-  
centric approach to establish trust  
with multiple stakeholders  
andtranslate business priorities into  
solutions.

SKILLS

GTM & Business Development:  
territory strategy, outbound lead  
generation, full sales cycle  
management, negotiation, C-level  
relationships, multithreading, pipeline  
management, forecasting, account  
expansion, business cases, events,  
customer success.

Sales Methodologies:  
Relationship, Consultative,  
Challenger and Value Selling.

Sales Technologies:  
ZoomInfo, Outreach, 6sense,  
Salesforce, Sales Navigator.

Solutions Expertise:  
Enterprise SaaS, Application  
Performance Management, Full  
Stack Observability, Workforce  
Collaboration, Storage, Servers,  
Networking, EUC.

Industry Expertise: Manufacturing,  
Financial Services, Retail, Insurance,  
Health & Pharma.

Languages: Spanish, Portuguese  
(C2); English (C1); French (B2).

EDUCATION

Riverton University  
MSc, Sustainable Innovation Mgmt  
Amsterdam, Netherlands  
Expected graduation Jul 2025

Cedar Ridge University  
BA, Advertising  
Austin, USA  
Graduated Aug 2013

PROFESSIONAL BACKGROUND

International Student (Academic Sabbatical) Jul 2023 — present  
Riverton University, MSc Sustainable Innovation Management, Aurora Scholars Scholarship Amsterdam, Netherlands  

» Selected among the top 5% applicants globally, conducting thesis research on the state of Al in sales.

Sr. Solution Sales Account Executive Jul 2022 — Apr 2023  
NimbusFlow, LOB Country Sales London, UK  

Drove net new customer acquisition for aa. growing territory revenue by +62% YoY.  
Increased avg deal size by 20% (~80k) by partnering with industry AEs to map cross-selling optts.  
Revived stalled deals engaging Value Advisory and ELT, securing two $350k+ contracts in 6 months.  
Generated $1.4M in ACV, surpassing financial plan by 12%.

Sr. Account Executive Oct 2021 — Jul 2022  
ApexCloud, Region & Solutions London, UK  

Acquired regional large enterprises and scale-ups, enabling customers with EBEBEM strategies.  
Improved lead flow by 25% by running market analysis to enhance plays with Sales Development team.  
Increased territory revenue by +27% YoY using a land & expand piloting strategy.

Global Account Manager Nov 2018 — Oct 2021  
GlobeGrid Systems, Regional Enterprise Team London, UK  

Exceeded $14M quota by coordinating strategic projects of global enterprises in Latam (+3k FTE).  
Built relationships with regional CxOs and multiple levels, expanding BEaHIGIS footprint to new BUs.  
Designed account-based campaigns adopted as team blueprints, boosting pipeline generation by 15%.  
Won 3 fast-start awards and had an average revenue achievement of ~127% (~29% YoY).

Commercial Account Manager May 2017 — Oct 2018  
IronGate Technologies, Country Acquisition London, UK  

Built and managed a new account portfolio from zero, driving $1.5M in revenue within 12 months.  
Gained leadership recognition for maintaining excellent customer satisfaction (~85 active accounts).  
First to be promoted after achieving 175% rev. attainment (FY18); reached 188% att. in FY19H1.

Online Marketing Analyst Aug 2015 — May 2017  
IronGate Technologies, irongate.com region Dublin, Ireland  

Increased sales margin in 11% by launching premium offers with strategic partners (e.g. Arcadia Investment Group).  
Created a cross-functional process to enable bundle selling, ramping unit sales by 8%.  
Disrupted a cycle of 5 years of decline of the online store with +9% YoY in revenue (FY17).

Demand Generation Marketing Assistant Feb 2014 — Jul 2015  
IronGate Technologies, Country B2B Marketing Austin, USA
